official_title: To repeal the increase provided under the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 in the base composite rate used to determine the amount of payment for dialysis services under title XVIII of the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1986 to repeal the increase provided under the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 in payments under the Medicare program (title XVIII of the Social Security Act) for kidney dialysis services.

titles.title: To repeal the increase provided under the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 in the base composite rate used to determine the amount of payment for dialysis services under title XVIII of the Social Security Act.
